name: Bauer Smith
description: I hate lies, I hate dirty people , I dont like loquacious woman ,I also dont like greediness cos I believe in giving and its only when u give u will take its a natural law of creation.I am a cool minded person , I love being straight forward in my activities with people,infact the reason my folks like me is just cos of my policy of being simple as I believe Greatness Lies In Simplicity how about u dont u think so
